# Scripts

Bundled resources for computer-vision-processor skill

- [x] image_analyzer.py: Script to perform various image analysis tasks (object detection, classification, segmentation) based on user input and specified models.
- [x] model_downloader.py: Script to download pre-trained computer vision models (e.g., YOLO, ResNet) from online sources.
- [x] format_converter.py: Script to convert images between different formats (e.g., PNG, JPG, TIFF) to ensure compatibility with analysis tools.
